snippet: Personal passion, as well as the need to entertain clients, can determine whether a business subscribes to the opera or has season tickets to Giants games.
abstract: Personal interests of executives, as well as the need to entertain clients, can determine whether a business subscribes to the opera or has luxury-box season tickets for professional sports teams.
lead_paragraph: Personal passion, as well as the need to entertain clients, can determine whether a business subscribes to the opera or has season tickets to Giants games.

headline.seo: Season Tickets, for Love of Sport, Culture or Comfort
headline.main: The Best Seats in the House, or Maybe Ballpark
headline.print_headline: The Best Seats in the House, or Maybe Ballpark
